oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Drawing of men loading a wagon by Francis Mohrhardt
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pencil drawing of four men, from Civil War era, loading a wagon near tents.
Francis Mohrhardt was an army engineer in the Tennessee Campaign during the U. S. Civil War. He served as a topographical engineer attached to the staff of General P. H. Sherman (1862-1863).
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Francis Mohrhardt
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Pencil drawing - 19th Century
Drawings; Soldiers
